name: UniCarbKB RDF / SPARQL
body:
### Welcome to the UniCarbKB RDF Model 
This page should be read in conjunction with the [GlycoRDF](https://github.com/ReneRanzinger/GlycoRDF) project site and [GlyTouCan](http://code.glytoucan.org/rdf-ontology/rdf-doc.html). This is a working document that provides information on the RDF model with a focus on glycoprotein specific data stored in UniCarbKB.


### Example RDF Triples

#### Glycan Sequence
```
<http://rdf.unicarbkb.org/glycan/123>
    a	glycan:saccharide ;
    glycan:has_glycosequence
    <http://rdf.unicarbkb.org/glycan/123/glycoct> 
    <http://rdf.unicarbkb.org/glycan/123/uoxf> .
```

#### GlycoCT Structure Representation
```
<http://rdf.glycoinfo.org/glycan/123/glycoct>
    a	glycan:glycosequence ;
    glycan:in_carbohydrate_format    
    glycan:carbohydrate_format_glycoct ;
    glycan:has_sequence	
        “RES…”^^xsd:string .
```

```

#### Oxford Notation
<http://rdf.unicarbkb.org/glycan/123/uoxf>
    a glycan:glycosequence ;
    glycan:in_carbohydrate_format    
    glycan:carbohydrate_format_uoxf ;
    glycan:has_uoxf
        "A2G(4)1"^^xsd:string .
```
#### Protein Summary

```
@PREFIX glycan: <http://purl.jp/bio/12/glyco/glycan#> .
@PREFIX uniprot: <http://purl.uniprot.org/core/> .

<http://rdf.unicarbkb.org/proteinsummary/P00740>
    glycan:has_attached_glycan
        <http://rdf.unicarbkb.org/structure/705>…
    glycan:has_glycosylated_AA
        <http://rdf.unicarbkb.org/glycoAASite/195_SER107> , 
        <http://rdf.unicarbkb.org/glycoAASite/195_SER99> ;
    glycan:has_uniprot_accession
        "uniprot:P00740" . 
```

#### Glycoprotein Site
```
<http://rdf.unicarbkb.org/glycoAASite/195_SER99>
    a glycan:glycosylated_AA ;
    <http://biohackathon.org/resource/faldoLocation>
        <http://rdf.unicarbkb.org/position/P00740_SER99> ;
    glycan:amino_acid <serine> ;
    glycan:has_attached_glycan
        <http://rdf.unicarbkb.org/structure/705>…
    glycan:modification_type
        "O-glycosylation"^^xsd:string .
```


### Support or Contact
For help and updates on availability of UniCarbKB contact Matthew Campbell
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
